item.title: This is a standard Post (with Comments)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There is no denying the fact that the success of an advertisement lies mostly in the headline. The headline should attract the reader and make him read the rest of the advertisement. The headline should be simply catchy and various key points should be embedded when deciding on the headline for the ad. The headline should catch attention of the eye at the first glance. Words in headlines should act as tags for the advertisement. It should say it all about the content that follows.

If a company is selling reasonably priced furniture, the headline of their advertisement should be âDurable furniture for less priceâ. This headline will attract the right customers who are on a look out for durable furniture as well as low cost furniture. If the customers to be reached belong to a category that are interested in decorating their house with beautiful furniture and arenât concerned about the price to get the right look, then the headline can be âChange how your house looks by our oriental furnitureâ.

Anything other than the prospects should not be included in the headline. If both men and women can use a product, both of them should be referred to in the title, missing out even one of the category is like losing a huge number of potential customers.

The title should be instant product seller. According to a research, five times more readers read just the headline when compared to those who read the complete advertisement. So the investment is of no use, if the title isnât good enough to sell the product. There can be a possibility that the content of the ad isnât strong enough. All the harm can be undone by having a powerful headline. The headline should be centered on the product and not the company that is selling the product. The customerâs interest should be reflected and he should feel that he is directly addressed. Start with âyouâ and not âweâ. So if the client specified on mentioning the companyâs name, donât start the sentence with it. For example, instead of writing âTylenol â solution for sever cold â, write âGot sever cold? Try Tylenolâ. Never forget to mention the name of the product in the headline. The product name should be of top priority. A snapshot of the benefits of the product should be given in the headline.

item.title: This is a Quote Post
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There is no denying the fact that the success of an advertisement lies mostly in the headline. The headline should attract the reader and make him read the rest of the advertisement. The headline should be simply catchy and various key points should be embedded when deciding on the headline for the ad. The headline should catch attention of the eye at the first glance. Words in headlines should act as tags for the advertisement. It should say it all about the content that follows.

If a company is selling reasonably priced furniture, the headline of their advertisement should be âDurable furniture for less priceâ. This headline will attract the right customers who are on a look out for durable furniture as well as low cost furniture. If the customers to be reached belong to a category that are interested in decorating their house with beautiful furniture and arenât concerned about the price to get the right look, then the headline can be âChange how your house looks by our oriental furnitureâ.

Anything other than the prospects should not be included in the headline. If both men and women can use a product, both of them should be referred to in the title, missing out even one of the category is like losing a huge number of potential customers.

The title should be instant product seller. According to a research, five times more readers read just the headline when compared to those who read the complete advertisement. So the investment is of no use, if the title isnât good enough to sell the product. There can be a possibility that the content of the ad isnât strong enough. All the harm can be undone by having a powerful headline. The headline should be centered on the product and not the company that is selling the product. The customerâs interest should be reflected and he should feel that he is directly addressed. Start with âyouâ and not âweâ. So if the client specified on mentioning the companyâs name, donât start the sentence with it. For example, instead of writing âTylenol â solution for sever cold â, write âGot sever cold? Try Tylenolâ. Never forget to mention the name of the product in the headline. The product name should be of top priority. A snapshot of the benefits of the product should be given in the headline.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

item.title: This is a Video Post (Vimeo)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
There is no denying the fact that the success of an advertisement lies mostly in the headline. The headline should attract the reader and make him read the rest of the advertisement. The headline should be simply catchy and various key points should be embedded when deciding on the headline for the ad. The headline should catch attention of the eye at the first glance. Words in headlines should act as tags for the advertisement. It should say it all about the content that follows.

If a company is selling reasonably priced furniture, the headline of their advertisement should be âDurable furniture for less priceâ. This headline will attract the right customers who are on a look out for durable furniture as well as low cost furniture. If the customers to be reached belong to a category that are interested in decorating their house with beautiful furniture and arenât concerned about the price to get the right look, then the headline can be âChange how your house looks by our oriental furnitureâ.

Anything other than the prospects should not be included in the headline. If both men and women can use a product, both of them should be referred to in the title, missing out even one of the category is like losing a huge number of potential customers.

The title should be instant product seller. According to a research, five times more readers read just the headline when compared to those who read the complete advertisement. So the investment is of no use, if the title isnât good enough to sell the product. There can be a possibility that the content of the ad isnât strong enough. All the harm can be undone by having a powerful headline. The headline should be centered on the product and not the company that is selling the product. The customerâs interest should be reflected and he should feel that he is directly addressed. Start with âyouâ and not âweâ. So if the client specified on mentioning the companyâs name, donât start the sentence with it. For example, instead of writing âTylenol â solution for sever cold â, write âGot sever cold? Try Tylenolâ. Never forget to mention the name of the product in the headline. The product name should be of top priority. A snapshot of the benefits of the product should be given in the headline.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Envato Elements - Explainer from Envato Elements on Vimeo.

item.content:encoded:

[text* last-name class:form-control class:input-md placeholder "Last Name"]
[email* email class:form-control class:input-md placeholder "E-Mail-Address"]
[textarea* message x7 class:form-control class:textarea-md placeholder "Enter Your Message â¦"]
